name: .ILO File Extension
summary: Learn about .ILO files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open an ILO file with the I-LIVE-ON suite of applications, most of which are available for Windows and macOS. For example, I-LIVE-ON.Creator allows you to open and edit ILO files; I-LIVE-ON.NowStory allows you to watch the story an ILO file contains.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
